name: Freedom (itch) (Voldnaor)
description:
This is a game about a bird that strives for freedom.

There are definitely people who feel trapped in a cage and want to get free and be where they've been drawn to all their lives. Somewhere where they can breathe easy. To a place where they will not be condemned for their humane views on life. Where they can say, "I'm finally home."

Resolution: 1920x1080

Language: English
